TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Ngyaw, title = Ngyaw, year = 2024, month = November, day = 18, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ngyaw} }

S.FORM: ngyaw (ke' na Plmukan: )ga qsinu ru tpngan na squliq. baq maniq qoli na ngyaw. blaq mstopun ngyaw. ngugun ka ngyaw.
